mapper.select: select SERIALNO, RELATIVESERIALNO, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, LOWLIMIT, UPLIMIT, SINGLESUM, RELATIVETYPE from LOAN_ORG_BANK_CHARGE where SERIALNO = #{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SERIALNO, RELATIVESERIALNO, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, LOWLIMIT, UPLIMIT, SINGLESUM, RELATIVETYPE from LOAN_ORG_BANK_CHARGE
